welcome: Welcome to Dooit, choose your settings
no-habits: Click plus button to add a habit
play-habits: Click play button to start your day
no-weights: Click plus button to add your weight
no-costs: Click plus button to add a cost
no-plans: Click plus button to add a plan
no-tasks-done: Click plus button to add a task to do
no-items-bought: Click plus button to add a item to buy
income: Will you support me with coffee? :)
